result.title: 6047 — PERFECT MATCHING — Live archive
result.content: Hi everyone. Last week I was training in A2 with random problems selected from all judges and I found this problem: https://icpcarchive.ecs.baylor.edu/index.php?option=onlinejudge&page=show_problem&problem=4058. I was thinking about how to solve it without getting TLE and the truth is that I have no idea. Is there anyone who has solved this problem? or maybe someone who can suggest me an approach for solving it? Thanks in advance! :)
